content:
Posted: April 1
												This is a short advertisement for a car set in the Star Wars universe. It is a non-interactive 360° 3D video (3D is most noticeable inside the car) and it's supposed to be watched seated. I give this a thumbs-up since it is technically well made and I like the Star Wars theme. Personally I don't drive a Nissan and don't plan to do so.
